Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/ 55th
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 55th, King Drive and 61st near Cottage Grove/ 55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 55th, King Drive, 61st and Cottage Grove, due to police activity near Cottage Grove/ 55th.

Allow extra travel time.
